name: Rana
description: After your character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Type as your next off-field character. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Type as your next off-field character. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Type as your next off-field character. (Once per Round)
storytext: "We still have a lot of time with each other. We can explore the vastness of the forest, the world, and the future together."
